amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $29 million appropriated for the title III, Public law 480 program.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 as printed in the Congressional Record of June 10, 1996, to strike the $29,500,000 appropriation for commodities supplied in connection with dispositions abroad (as provided for in title III).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Goss amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
